article.name: Version 1.11.0

articleinfo.articlepurpose: New Library: Rational Number. Updated Libraries: Case, Config, Smart Pointer, Utility.

article.title: Version 1.11.0
article.para: Added Rational Number Library. Minor fixes to cast.hpp, config.hpp, smart_ptr.hpp, utility.hpp, and to the min_rand sample programs. Minor site cleanup (thanks to Paul Baxter).
